column4: What could be done to get better resolution ? I cant find in Display the 1024x768 settings. HELP PLEASE
most likely system > admin > Hardware drivers will have an appropriate driver for you also
what was the output of lspci | grep VGA    did it show you video card?
the driver should be fine out of the box? What version of ubuntu?
and it won't let you go higher than 1024? is this a laptop perhaps that doesn't support higher?
does the monitor support higher than 1024?
let me look up the monitor hold up
you could go higher with your desktop but you would have to scroll off screen with mouse
totem might which is the default player if not vlc should be able to handle them
vlc played failed to run it
you can install one if you want. Ubuntu server is basically just a different kernel and no gui by default.
